column5: Wow, I’m at a loss of words. I can’t even imagine the pain you, family, and friends are going through. I’m not going to say “it will be okay” because I, myself doesn’t even know if it will be okay. But, if you ever need someone to just rant to, just to talk to, I’m here for you, same goes for whoever reads this comment. It can help just to talk.♥️
Exactly, same here I do this and blame myself over stuff I didn’t even do. My fist thought is “I should go kill myself, I don’t deserve to be alive.”
